item.title: By: Fi and Si
item.dc:creator: Fi and Si
item.description: <p>Can't believe you're on the last leg of your trip. I'm sure HK is the best place for shopping (apart from New York!). I hope you find lots of gadgets. Looking forward to seeing you soon</p>
item.content:encoded: Can’t believe you’re on the last leg of your trip. I’m sure HK is the best place for shopping (apart from New York!). I hope you find lots of gadgets. Looking forward to seeing you soon

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>When you get to the peak remember that this is what our house was named after by people who had lived out there!! Are you buying a suit?</p>
item.content:encoded: When you get to the peak remember that this is what our house was named after by people who had lived out there!! Are you buying a suit?
